hero.description: Record your property visits by phone. The assistant automatically structures your notes and syncs them to Airtable.

verticals.title: Designed for Real Estate Professionals
verticals.subtitle: Save time after each visit. Simply call our assistant to record all important information.

realEstate.title: Property Visit Assistant
realEstate.description: Call after each property visit to quickly record the address, property type, size, price, condition, features, client feedback, and your personal notes. All information is automatically structured and synced to your Airtable database.

instantResponse.title: Quick Recording
instantResponse.description: No need to take notes during the visit. Simply call afterwards and describe your visit conversationally.

multilingual.title: Automatic Sync
multilingual.description: All your visit notes are automatically structured and synced to your Airtable database for optimal tracking.

integration.title: Available 24/7
integration.description: Record your visits anytime, even outside business hours. The assistant is always available for you.
